reference.shortdesc: A chapter indicates a topic or map as a chapter within a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The chapter element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample creates a book chapter that includes subtopics:<chapter href="intro.dita"> <topicref href="caring.dita"/> <topicref href="feeding.dita"/> </chapter> <chapter href="setup.dita"> <topicref href="prereq.dita"/> <topicref href="download.dita"/> </chapter>
The following code sample creates a chapter by referencing a DITA map of content:<chapter href="intro.ditamap" format="ditamap"/>
